panels.description:
Queries per second according to 
`pg_stat_statements`.`calls`
in last minute
panels.title: QPS (1m)

panels.description: Average Query Latency according to `pg_stat_statements`: rate of `total_exec_time` / rate of `calls` in last minute

targets.expr:
rate(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m]) /
 rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m])

panels.title: RT (1m)

panels.description:
Queries per second according to 
`pg_stat_statements`.`calls`
in last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Query Calls (QPS 1m/5m/15m)

panels.description: coefficient of variation, CV of Query Latency in last 5 minutes
panels.title: RT Variation σ/µ (5m)

panels.description: Average Query Latency according to `pg_stat_statements`: rate of `total_exec_time` / rate of `calls` in last 1m, 5m, 15m

targets.expr:
increase(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m]) /
 increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m])

increase(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) /
 increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])

increase(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m]) /
 increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m])

panels.title: Query Latency (RT 1m/5m/15m)

panels.description: coefficient of variation, CV of QPS in last 5 minutes
panels.title: QPS Variation σ/µ (5m)

panels.description: QPS distribution in last 15 minute (offset 8min)
panels.title: QPS Distribution (15m)

panels.description: Average Response time distribution in last 15 minute (offset 8min)
panels.title: RT Distribution (15m)

panels.description: Average number of rows returned by this query. Rate of `pg_stat_statements`: `rows` / `call` in last 1m, 5m, 15m

targets.expr:
rate(pg_query_rows{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m]) / 
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m])

rate(pg_query_rows{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) / 
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])

rate(pg_query_rows{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m]) / 
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m])

panels.title: Rows Returned per Query (1m, 5m, 15m)

panels.description: Average execution time of this query. Rate of `pg_stat_statements`: `total_exec_time`/`call` in last 1m, 5m, 15m

targets.expr:
rate(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m]) / 
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m])

rate(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) / 
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])

rate(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m]) / 
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m])

panels.title: Execution Time per Query (1m, 5m, 15m)

panels.description: Average number of WAL Bytes generated by this query. Rate of `pg_stat_statements`.`wal_bytes` in last 1m, 5m, 15m

targets.expr:
rate(pg_query_wal_bytes{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m]) /
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m])

rate(pg_query_wal_bytes{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])/
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])

rate(pg_query_wal_bytes{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m])/
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m])

panels.title: WAL Bytes per Query (1m, 5m, 15m)

panels.description: Avery seconds of IO(blocks read+write) time spent by this query. Rate of `pg_stat_statements`: `blk_read_time` + `blk_write_time` in last 1m, 5m, 15m

targets.expr:
rate(pg_query_io_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m]) / 
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m])

rate(pg_query_io_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) / 
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])

rate(pg_query_io_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m]) / 
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m])

panels.title: I/O Time per Query (1m, 5m, 15m)

panels.description:
Average number of bytes (blocks multiply default 8K page size) read/written from/to (disk/fs cache) by this query

`pg_stat_statements`: `shared_blks_read` , `shared_blks_written` , write is plot with negative Y axis

targets.expr:
rate(pg_query_sblk_read{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) * 8192
/
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])

- rate(pg_query_sblk_written{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) * 8192 /
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])

panels.title: Shared Blocks Read/Write per Query (5m)

panels.description:
Average number of bytes (blocks multiply default 8K page size) hit/dirtied from/to (disk/fs cache) by this query

`pg_stat_statements`: `shared_blks_hit` , `shared_blks_dirtied` , dirty is plot with negative Y axis

targets.expr:
rate(pg_query_sblk_hit{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) * 8192
/
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])

- rate(pg_query_sblk_dirtied{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) * 8192 /
rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])

panels.title: Shared Blocks Hit/Dirtied per Query (5m)

panels.description: Number of rows returned by this query per second. Rate of `pg_stat_statements`.`rows` in last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Rows Returned per Second (1m, 5m, 15m)

panels.description: Seconds of exec time spent by this query per second. Rate of `pg_stat_statements`.`total_exec_time` in last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Execution Time per Second (1m, 5m, 15m)

panels.description: Number of WAL Bytes generated by this query per second. Rate of `pg_stat_statements`.`wal_bytes` in last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: WAL Bytes per Second (1m, 5m, 15m)

panels.description: Seconds of IO(blocks read+write) time spent by this query per second. Rate of `pg_stat_statements`: `blk_read_time` + `blk_write_time` in last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: I/O Time per Second (1m, 5m, 15m)

panels.description:
Number of bytes (blocks multiply default 8K page size) dirtied / written by this query per second.

`pg_stat_statements`: `shared_blks_dirtied` , `shared_blks_written` 

Dirtied >= Write because a block may by updated multiple time before written to disk.
panels.title: Shared Blocks Dirtied/Write per Second (5m)

panels.description:
Number of bytes (blocks multiply default 8K page size) read / hit by this query per second.

`pg_stat_statements`: `shared_blks_read` , `shared_blks_hit` and  `hit` / `(read+hit)` 

Usually, Hit >> Read, which means hit ratio ~ 1.0

targets.expr:
rate(pg_query_sblk_hit{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) / 
(rate(pg_query_sblk_hit{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) + rate(pg_query_sblk_read{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) * 8192)

panels.title: Shared Blocks Read per Second (5m) & Blocks Hit Ratio

panels.description:
Query QPS of this database ${datname} on ${ins} in last 5 minutes.

rate 5m of `pg_stat_statements`.`calls`
Click datapoint to check a specific query.
panels.title: Query QPS (5m)

panels.description:
Query RT of this database ${datname} on ${ins}.

rate 1m of `total_exec_time` / `calls`

Click datapoint to check a specific query.
panels.title: Query RT (1m)

panels.description: Size by exec time spent in last hour, Colored by RT in last hour

targets.rawSql:
SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.rows AS value, s.mean_exec_time AS rt
FROM pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname' AND rows > 0
ORDER BY calls DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.rows AS value, s.mean_exec_time AS rt
FROM pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname' AND rows > 0
ORDER BY calls DESC
LIMIT 100;

panels.title: Exec Time / RT Matrix (1h)

panels.description:
Numbers of rows returned of each query in this database ${datname} on ${ins} in last 5 minutes.

rate 5m of `pg_stat_statements`.`calls`
Click datapoint to check a specific query.
panels.title: Rows Returned (5m)

panels.description:
Time spent on executing statements  during last 1 hour.

increase1h of `pg_stat_statements`.`total_exec_time`
panels.title: Exec Time Spent (1h)

panels.description:
Exec Time Spent of this database ${datname} on ${ins}.

rate 5m of `pg_stat_statements`.`calls`
Click datapoint to check a specific query.
panels.title: Exec Time Spent (5m)

panels.description:
Shared blocks access & read size in bytes, in last 1 hour of each query.

`pg_stat_statements`: `share_blks_read` + `shared_blks_hit`
panels.title: Blocks Access (1h)

panels.description:
Numbers of wal bytes generated of each query in this database ${datname} on ${ins} in last 5 minutes.

rate 5m of `pg_stat_statements`.`wal_bytes`

Click the data-point to check a specific query.
panels.title: WAL Bytes (5m)

list.description: IP address of this postgres instance
list.label: IP
list.name: ip

list.description: Sequence number of this instance, which is an unique integer among a postgres cluster
list.label: Sequence
list.name: seq

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls

list.description: Node name of current postgres instance
list.label: Node
list.name: node
